short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collapse (hide) facebook comments containing tagged people.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Comment Collapser is extension that collapses all comments on facebook.com domain whose content contains link to another user's profile. Toolbar button is provided for hiding of all visible collapsed comments.
